input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_ARS_System
XML Document - This is an XML document that contains the exported audit data.
Name of the audit job for which change and incident is to be opened.
DBKey of the audit job in question.
DBKey of the audit job run to be analysed.
Run ID of the audit job run to be analysed.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </status-message> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <inconsistent-target> <hostname>${hostname}</hostname> <xsl:for-each select="//target[@server-name='${hostname}']/components/component"> <xsl:variable name="component" select="." /> <xsl:for-each select="//compliant-audit-items[target/text()=concat('"', $component, '"')]"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </inconsistent-target> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Name:",//job-name/text(), " Host:${hostname} RunIndex: ${audit job run index} JobType:${audit job type}")

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Incidents> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//incident) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//incident" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${incident}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Incidents> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: substring(concat(., ": :${audit job name}:${audit job key}:${audit job run key}:${audit job run index}"), 1, 99)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Hostname: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="//inconsistent-target/hostname/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> Server Object,Stat,Item,Target,ACL Path,Consistent,Details </xsl:text> <xsl:for-each select="//compliant-audit-items"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(server-object/text(), ',', stat/text(), ',', item/text(), ',', target/text(), ',', acl/text(), ',', consistent/text(), ',', details/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:for-each> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:copy-of select="//job[job-name/text()='${audit job name}']" /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <root> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> ${job} </root> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">IncidentNumber:${incident number} JobName:${job name} InconsistentTarget:${hostname}</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> Templates:</xsl:text> <xsl:variable name="templates"> <xsl:for-each select="//job/templates/template"> <xsl:if test="//target/templates/template/text()=name/text()"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(group/text(), '/', name/text(), ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select="substring($templates, 1, string-length(string($templates)) - 1)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> RunIndex:${run index}</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> JobType:${job type}</xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//change) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//change" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${change}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Changes> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.value: CMDB not enabled in configuration. skipping incident and task association with configuration item.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='true'">${bl server class name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${configuration server class name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat('Configuration item not found for ', ., '. Unable to relate incident to Configuration Item.')

output.value: Unable to relate task to Configuration Item.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Relationships created successfully for Task ID: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Incidents> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//incident) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//incident" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${incident}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Incidents> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.) = 'success' and '${task success status}' = 'success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Failed targets for </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="substring(//job-name/text(), 1, 99)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Failed server list: </xsl:text> <xsl:for-each select="//failed-targets/*"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:for-each> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Incidents> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//incident) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//incident" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${incident}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Incidents> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.value: CMDB not enabled in configuration. skipping incident association with configuration item.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='true'">${bl server class name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${configuration server class name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Incidents> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//incident) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//incident" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${incident}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Incidents> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow creates ITSM incidents and changes for the inconsistent targets found the the given audit job run.
